Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near Garfield/Artesian
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield  buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 51st, California and 55th: due to, street blockage near Garfield/Artesian.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 51st, California, 55th and over regular route, due to street blockage near Garfield/Artesian.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
